metadata.name: The Art Of Standing By
metadata.description:
With this piece, I wanted to convey the feeling of time passing while waiting for an important moment in life. The subject is struggling to find calm in a storm. He stares at his glasses floating in the waves as if they were the view into his future. The Cigarette and lighter show us a slow burning away of moments.
